original_text: The men stayed there with David for three days. Their relatives had prepared a lot of food for them. So they enjoyed a big feast together.
korean_text: 무리가 거기서 다윗과 함께 사흘을 지내며 먹고 마셨으니 이는 그들의 형제가 이미 식물을 준비하였음이며

sentences.original_text: The men stayed there with David
Their relatives had prepared a lot of food
So they enjoyed a big feast together
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 함께 큰 잔치를 즐겼습니다
